title: NATO established to counter spread of communism

content.question: In 1949, NATO was established so that Western leaders could counter

choices.label: the perceived threat that the Soviet Union and its allies would spread communism
free-market advocates in the United States and Great Britain
the decolonization of Africa and nationalization of Western industry there
the growing power of developing countries in the United Nations

content.answer: the perceived threat that the Soviet Union and its allies would spread communism
